item.description:
Belding is definitely a hidden gem with a couple of streams and a pond. Perfect for a spring leisurely walk in the woods.

As with all of my hikes, kids and dogs are welcome, though this particular day I probably won't have either with me.

We will meet at the 7-11 parking lot on the corner of Route 30 and Vernon Avenue in Vernon at 3:00 and travel from there to the trailhead together. For those who know where the trailhead is on Tamarack, feel free to meet us there at 3:15.

Approximate location/directions of meetup location at 7-11 on corner of Vernon Ave. and Rte. 30 in Vernon, CT:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Approximate location/directions of trailhead at cul-de-sac on Tamarack Ln. (misspelled at MapQuest as Tamarac Ln.):
http://www.mapquest.c...

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the 7-11 on Route 30 in Vernon at 3:00 and travel to the trailhead together from there.
item.why: Perfect for those who cannot do Kevin's ten mile jaunt on the AT for some reason! :-)
